original_text: The friends of Jesus were there. The women that had come with him from Galilee were also there. They were all standing a long way away. They also saw what happened to him.
korean_text: 예수를 아는 자들과 갈릴리로부터 따라온 여자들도 다 멀리 서서 이 일을 보니라

sentences.original_text: The friends of Jesus were there
The women that had come with him from Galilee
They were all standing a long way away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 멀리 떨어져 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: They also saw what happened to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그에게 일어난 일을 보았다
